name: untitled speedrunning game
description:
unitled speedrunning game

Make your way to the spaceship waiting for you as quickly as possible. You're being timed, but there's no time limit, nor punishment for being slow. On your first run through it's probably best to take your time and figure out what's what as you go. 

If you get a time faster than about 1 minute, consider sharing your run (speedrun.com when that gets set up or just a yt video) 

The game took a couple of weeks so it's a little rough around the edges, but I hope you find that it plays well.
